data.comment: The big names in today's match at King Power Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 6, Anthony Taylor signals a Leicester throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 12, Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
An attacking Leicester player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Jamie Vardy converts the penalty to give Leicester a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 16, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Throw-in Leicester.
In the minute 18, Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anthony Taylor awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 31, Christian Fuchs of Leicester gets in a strike, but is off target.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Wolverhampton at King Power Stadium.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Leicester.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 36, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Leicester have been given a penalty at King Power Stadium...
In the minute 39, Leicester are awarded a penalty at King Power Stadium. Jamie Vardy takes the kick ... But misses!
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 41, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wolverhampton's Leander Dendoncker has been booked in Leicester.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Wolverhampton just outside Leicester's area.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Important block from the Leicester defence as Ruben Neves fires in a strike for Wolverhampton.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at King Power Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Leicester attack but Youri Tielemans's header doesn't find the target.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Marc Albrighton is on a sub for Luke Thomas for Leicester.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 48, Nelson Semedo for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Anthony Taylor awards Leicester a goal kick.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick Leicester.
Ruben Neves (Wolverhampton) has received a yellow card from Anthony Taylor.
Leicester are coming forward and Youri Tielemans gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy gets in a shot on goal at King Power Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Leicester.
Pedro Neto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Wolverhampton.
James Maddison (Leicester) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 57, Leicester have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leicester surge into the attack at King Power Stadium but Jonny Evansâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at King Power Stadium.
Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) is making a first substitution, with Adama Traore replacing Daniel Podence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jonny Evans (Leicester) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves breaks free at King Power Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Anthony Taylor awards Leicester a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 67, Wolverhampton advance rapidly upfield but Anthony Taylor blows for offside.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Max Kilman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Throw-in Leicester.
Anthony Taylor signals a Leicester throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced James Maddison with Harvey Barnes. This is the second substitution made today by Brendan Rodgers.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Nuno Espirito Santo is making the team's second substitution at King Power Stadium with Fernando Marcal replacing Rayan Ait-Nouri.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Wolverhampton are pushing forward but Leander Dendoncker's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 79, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Wolverhampton.
Fabio Silva is replacing Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton at King Power Stadium.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
In the minute 80, Wes Morgan is replacing Dennis Praet for the home team.
In the minute 81, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wesley Fofana (Leicester) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Leicester's area.
Leicester's Harvey Barnes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 83, In Leicester Leicester attack through Christian Fuchs. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at King Power Stadium.
Leicester needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 85, Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leicester's half?
Throw-in Leicester.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 88, Free kick Wolverhampton.
In Leicester, Fabio Silva (Wolverhampton) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anthony Taylor awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Wolverhampton.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Leicester.
Leicester to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
At King Power Stadium, Max Kilman has been yellow-carded for the away team.
